Welcome to the lab simulation

In this section, you’ll test your hypothesis by doing the experiment yourself. Here’s how the lab works:

Learn the equipment
Set up the equipment
Learn the procedures
Experiment
Record observations

Before building your own lab, check out the circuit diagram.

Steps

Circuit Diagram

Now let’s arrange all the equipment. You can move them freely.

Once done, tap on the “Finalize Position” button on the top right corner.

Now you’ve placed all equipment, let’s connect them by tapping one blue dot (the first terminal) and another blue dot(the second terminal).

Next, follow the experiment procedures, and fill in your findings in the observation table here.

Congratulations! You did the experiment

Let's summarize our learnings. Please rotate your phone to portrait mode for the next section.

Lab Information

1. Place all lab equipment in the desired positions.

2. Finalize the positions of the equipment.

3. Connect the wires by dragging from one blue dot to another.

4. Submit the wire connections.

5. Close the keys and adjust the resistance values.

6. Enter the readings into the observation table.
